name: Floating Solar Farms
description: Solar panels installed on water bodies, such as lakes and reservoirs, to maximize space utilization.

name: Vertical Axis Wind Turbines (VAWTs)
description: Wind turbines with a vertical design suitable for urban and space-constrained environments.
challenges: Lower efficiency compared to horizontal turbines

name: Artificial Photosynthesis Systems
description: Technology mimicking natural photosynthesis to produce fuels using sunlight, water, and carbon dioxide.

name: Kite-Powered Wind Energy
description: Energy harnessed by high-altitude kites or airborne wind turbines capturing stronger and consistent winds.

name: Ocean Thermal Energy Conversion (OTEC)
description: A system that exploits temperature differences between surface and deep ocean water to generate electricity.

name: Piezoelectric Energy Systems
description: Energy generated from mechanical stress, such as footsteps or vehicle movements, using piezoelectric materials.

name: Bioengineered Algae Farms
description: Using genetically modified algae to produce biofuels and absorb CO2.

name: Dynamic Solar Roads
description: Road surfaces embedded with solar panels to generate energy while supporting vehicle traffic.
